tool_description: Generates candidate transit routes connecting high-demand origin-destination pairs while considering network topology and operational constraints.

stop_coordinates.description: Stop locations as [lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, ...]

road_network_data.description: Path to road network data (OSM, shapefile, or graph format)

route_directness_factor.description: Route directness requirement (1.0-2.0, lower is more direct)

error_messages: Demand matrix dimension mismatch: Matrix size must match number of origin-destination zones.
Insufficient stop data: Provide at least 3 stop coordinates (6 array elements).
Road network inaccessible: Check road_network_data path and format compatibility.
Invalid route parameters: max_route_length (5-50km), min_stops_per_route (3-15), route_directness_factor (1.0-2.0).
No feasible routes found: Relax constraints or check network connectivity.
usage: Provide demand matrix, stop coordinates, and road network. Configure route generation parameters. Returns candidate routes with performance metrics.

generated_routes.description: Route identifiers for generated candidate routes

route_stops.description: Number of stops for each generated route

route_lengths.description: Length in kilometers for each route

demand_served.description: Total daily demand served by each route
